metadata.title: CVE-2018-16424 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A double free when handling responses in read_file in tools/egk-tool.c (akathe eGK card tool) in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackersable to supply crafted smartcards to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0~rc1-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0~rc1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0~rc1-1').
